column5: hello i am new to this board and i am looking for information on musky fishing in the mill lake area of greorgian bay. or the McGREGOR BAY area. i am going to take my first trip to Georgian bay to musky fish and any info would be greatly appreciated. thank you frank
Your best bet for muskie in Gbay is Severn/Waub/HH.  Hire a local guide and hope you see a fish
